name: Fastest Man Alive
description: Ima be completely honest I am a 10 year old trying to start game development without getting money. I just do it for fun. This game is in early development stages like my other games. This game will have constant updates so keep look out. As of now you can only run around. Speed force is also in development. It will be it's own game but also be in this game. That's all I have to say. Bye!
